data.name: ArgumentExceptionWithoutNameofOperatorAnalyzerMessage
data.value: The variable {0} is used in an ArgumentException as string. Consider using the nameof operator instead.

data.name: ArgumentExceptionWithoutNameofOperatorAnalyzerTitle
data.value: An ArgumentException should use nameof() to refer to a variable.

data.name: AsToCastAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Use cast instead of as.

data.name: AsToCastAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Changes an 'as' expression to a cast.

data.name: AsyncMethodWithoutAsyncSuffixAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Asynchronous method "{0}" does not end with 'Async'.

data.name: AsyncMethodWithoutAsyncSuffixAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Asynchronous methods should end with the -Async suffix.

data.name: AttributesCategory
data.value: Attributes

data.name: AttributeWithEmptyArgumentListAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Attribute "{0}" has an empty argument list.

data.name: AttributeWithEmptyArgumentListAnalyzerTitle
data.value: An attribute should not have an empty argument list.

data.name: CastToAsAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Use as instead of a cast.

data.name: CastToAsAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Changes a cast expression to 'as'.

data.name: CatchNullReferenceExceptionAnalyzerMessage
data.value: A catch clause catches NullReferenceException. Consider using != null or null propagation instead.

data.name: CatchNullReferenceExceptionAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Verifies no NullReferenceException is caught.

data.name: CompareBooleanToFalseLiteralAnalyzerMessage
data.value: A boolean expression can be simplified.

data.name: CompareBooleanToFalseLiteralAnalyzerTitle
data.value: A boolean expression comparing to false can be simplified.

data.name: CompareBooleanToTrueLiteralAnalyzerMessage
data.value: A boolean expression can be simplified.

data.name: CompareBooleanToTrueLiteralAnalyzerTitle
data.value: A boolean expression comparing to true can be simplified.

data.name: ConditionalOperatorReturnsDefaultOptionsAnalyzerMessage
data.value: A conditional operator can be omitted.

data.name: ConditionalOperatorReturnsDefaultOptionsAnalyzerTitle
data.value: The conditional operator shouldn't return redundant default options.

data.name: EmptyArgumentExceptionAnalyzerMessage
data.value: An ArgumentException is thrown without a message.

data.name: EmptyArgumentExceptionAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Verifies whether an ArgumentException is thrown with a message.

data.name: EmptyCatchClauseAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Empty catch block detected. Consider adding a comment or a logging statement.

data.name: EmptyCatchClauseAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Warns when an exception catch block is empty.

data.name: ExceptionsCategory
data.value: Exceptions

data.name: ExplicitAccessModifiersAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Use explicit {0} modifier.

data.name: ExplicitAccessModifiersAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Inserts the default accessibility modifier for a declaration.

data.name: GeneralCategory
data.value: General

data.name: GotoDetectionAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Use of "goto" detected. Consider using a method or loop instead.

data.name: GotoDetectionAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Use of "goto" detected.

data.name: IfStatementWithoutBracesAnalyzerMessage
data.value: An if-statement should be written using braces.

data.name: IfStatementWithoutBracesAnalyzerTitle
data.value: If blocks should use braces to denote start and end.

data.name: NamingConventionsAnalyzerMessage
data.value: The {0} {1} does not follow naming conventions. Should be {2}.
data.comment: {0} - Member type {1} - Member name {2} - Modified member name

data.name: NamingConventionsAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Implements the most common configuration of naming conventions.

data.name: NonEncapsulatedOrMutableFieldAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Field {0} should be turned into a property.

data.name: NonEncapsulatedOrMutableFieldAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Internal or public fields should be immutable or a property.

data.name: NullableToShorthandAnalyzerMessage
data.value: {0} can be written using the shorthand nullable notation.

data.name: NullableToShorthandAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Use the shorthand T? notation for a nullable type.

data.name: ObsoleteAttributeWithoutReasonAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Give a reason for the [Obsolete] attribute.

data.name: ObsoleteAttributeWithoutReasonAnalyzerTitle
data.value: The [Obsolete] attribute doesn't have a reason.

data.name: OnPropertyChangedWithoutNameOfOperatorAnalyzerMessage
data.value: OnPropertyChanged({0}) can use the nameof() operator.

data.name: OnPropertyChangedWithoutNameOfOperatorAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Use the nameof() operator in conjunction with OnPropertyChanged()

data.name: RemoveTestSuffixAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Test method "{0}" should not end with "-Test"

data.name: RemoveTestSuffixAnalyzerTitle
data.value: A test method should not end with -Test.

data.name: ReplaceEmptyStringWithStringDotEmptyAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Empty string literal detected.

data.name: ReplaceEmptyStringWithStringDotEmptyAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Replaces an empty string literal with the more expressive string.Empty.

data.name: RethrowExceptionWithoutLosingStacktraceAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Rethrown exception loses the stacktrace.

data.name: RethrowExceptionWithoutLosingStacktraceAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Warns when an exception is rethrown in a way that it loses the stacktrace.

data.name: SimplifyExpressionBodiedMemberAnalyzerMessage
data.value: {0} {1} can be written using an expression-bodied member

data.name: SimplifyExpressionBodiedMemberAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Simplify the expression using an expression-bodied member.

data.name: SingleEmptyConstructorAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Type "{0}" has a redundant default constructor.

data.name: SingleEmptyConstructorAnalyzerTitle
data.value: A constructor is the same as a default constructor and can be removed.

data.name: SingleGeneralExceptionAnalyzerMessage
data.value: A single catch-all clause has been used. Consider adding specific exception handlers.

data.name: SingleGeneralExceptionAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Verifies whether a try-catch block does not defer all exception handling to a single Exception clause.

data.name: StringsCategory
data.value: Strings

data.name: TestMethodWithoutPublicModifierAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Test method "{0}" is not public.

data.name: TestMethodWithoutPublicModifierAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Verifies whether a test method has the public modifier.

data.value: Tests

data.name: TryCastWithoutUsingAsNotNullAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Variable {0} can be cast using as/null.

data.name: TryCastWithoutUsingAsNotNullAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Use as/null instead of is/as.

data.name: TypeToVarAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Replace the explicit type with 'var'

data.name: TypeToVarAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Use var instead of the explicit type.

data.value: Use nameof()

data.value: Use cast instead of as

data.value: Add -Async suffix

data.value: Remove parentheses from argument list

data.value: Simplify expression

data.name: NullableToShorthandCodeFixTitle
data.value: Use shorthand notation

data.value: Remove "-Test" suffix

data.name: ReplaceEmptyStringWithStringDotEmptyCodeFixTitle
data.value: Use string.Empty

data.name: RethrowExceptionWithoutLosingStacktraceCodeFixTitle
data.value: Remove rethrow

data.name: SimplifyExpressionBodiedMemberCodeFixTitle
data.value: Use expression bodied member

data.name: SingleEmptyConstructorCodeFixTitle
data.value: Remove empty constructor

data.name: TestMethodWithoutPublicModifierCodeFixTitle

data.name: TryCastWithoutUsingAsNotNullCodeFixTitle
data.value: Use as

data.value: Use var

data.name: ConditionalOperatorReturnsInvertedDefaultOptionsAnalyzerMessage
data.value: A conditional operator can be omitted.

data.name: ConditionalOperatorReturnsInvertedDefaultOptionsAnalyzerTitle
data.value: The conditional operator shouldn't return redundant inverted default options.

data.name: ConditionalOperatorReturnsInvertedDefaultOptionsCodeFixTitle
data.value: Remove conditional operator

data.name: UseAliasesInsteadOfConcreteTypeAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Use alias {0} instead of concrete type {1}.

data.name: UseAliasesInsteadOfConcreteTypeAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Use the built-in type alias instead of the concrete type.

data.name: UseAliasesInsteadOfConcreteTypeCodeFixTitle
data.value: Use alias

data.name: FlagsEnumValuesAreNotPowersOfTwoAnalyzerMessage
data.value: [Flags] enum {0} its values are not explicit powers of 2

data.name: FlagsEnumValuesAreNotPowersOfTwoAnalyzerTitle
data.value: A [Flags] enum its values are not explicit powers of 2

data.name: FlagsEnumValuesAreNotPowersOfTwoCodeFixTitle
data.value: Use powers of 2

data.value: Enum can have [Flags] attribute.

data.name: EnumCanHaveFlagsAttributeAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Gives an enum the `[Flags]` attribute.

data.value: Add [Flags] attribute

data.name: ConditionIsConstantAnalyzerMessage
data.value: Condition is always {0}.

data.name: ConditionIsConstantAnalyzerTitle
data.value: The condition is a constant and thus unnecessary.

data.name: ConditionIsConstantCodeFixTitle
data.value: Remove condition and unreachable code.

data.name: StringPlaceholdersInWrongOrderCodeFixTitle
data.value: Re-order placeholders

data.name: StringPlaceholdersInWrongOrderMessage
data.value: string.Format() Placeholders are not in ascending order.

data.name: StringPlaceholdersInWrongOrderTitle
data.value: Orders the arguments of a string.Format() call in ascending order according to index.

data.name: OnPropertyChangedWithoutCallerMemberNameAnalyzerMessage
data.value: OnPropertyChanged() can use the [CallerMemberName] attribute.

data.name: OnPropertyChangedWithoutCallerMemberNameAnalyzerTitle
data.value: OnPropertyChanged() can use the [CallerMemberName] attribute to automatically pass the property name.

data.name: OnPropertyChangedWithoutCallerMemberNameCodeFixTitle
data.value: Add attribute

data.value: A loop is not delimited with braces.

data.name: LoopStatementWithoutBracesAnalyzerTitle
data.value: Loop blocks should use braces to denote start and end.

data.name: LoopStatementWithoutBracesCodeFixTitle

data.value: Synchronous method "{0}" should not end with 'Async'.

data.value: A string.Format() call lacks arguments and will cause a runtime exception

data.value: The operands in the divisive expression {0} are both integers and result in an implicit rounding.

data.name: DivideIntegerByIntegerAnalyzerTitle
data.value: The operands of a divisive expression are both integers and result in an implicit rounding.
